title: Chicken War Continued, Sand and Soul, Hurricane Safety, R&B List and more.
itunes:title: Chicken War Continued, Sand and Soul, Hurricane Safety, R&B List and more.
description:
Happy Friday and welcome to the ride.  The chicken fight continues between Chick-fil-A and Popeyes.  Uncle Steve give us his list of The 50 Greatest R&B Singers.  Sand and Soul has a special just for Labor Day.  Things happen and we wonder when did they start.  Is your relationship too good or nah?  Does it need an argument here and there to be normal and healthy?  Hurricane season is here and we issue a friendly reminder to our family in those areas to be vigilant.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about the importance of talking to God and more.  Labor Day is coming up so have yourself a great three day weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
